title: Steadfast Maul

A weapon of dwarven make: elegant, but strong enough to last several human lifetimes.

Steadfast Maul is one of the Maul Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Steadfast Maul is a magical maul that can strike a foe preventing its movement and yours by external forces. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc.).
